701121f.text:
Goulden Ave. (running from right to left in center of view) between Bedford Park Boulevard and West 195th Street, showing the thoroughfare under construction. This area was formerly part of the Jerome Park
Reservoir. The view is in a westerly direction.
April 27, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
701121f.folder: Goulden Avenue & Bedford Park Boulevard, Bronx, NY
701121f.original_title: Bronx: Goulden Avenue - Bedford Park Boulevard
